item.description:
This week we're back at the Clear Conscience Cafe.  It's in Central Sq. and it will worked out well last time.  I'll try and stake out a spot early-ish.  Please consider supporting this local business with a small purchase as a thank you for allowing us to use the space.  This is not required, just nice.

ALL LEVELS WELCOME!!!  This format is probably even better suited to beginners so please don't hesitate to join us!!

Feel free to bring books, course work, or anything you want to share with the group. All levels are welcome.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Chinese books on the table :)

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Wednesday evening chinese/english language exchange group
